The [[New Britannia]] is a group of British sailors of the [[World War II|Second World War]] and their descendants by women in the [[Savage Land]]. They lived on an island in Lake Lost Sinister. For generations, the chief Rob Christopher and Chief [[Neu Deutschlanders (Earth-616)|Neu Deutschlanders]] Heinrich Draco continued hostilities, using dinosaurs as vehicles of war, until [[Ka-Zar]] put an end to the war. Draco and Christopher apparently perished and their people sought peace.
